com.nostra13.universalimageloader.cache.memory

类 BaseMemoryCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nostra13.universalimageloader.cache.memory.BaseMemoryCache
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MemoryCache
    直接已知子类:
    LimitedMemoryCache, WeakMemoryCache

    public abstract class BaseMemoryCache
extends Object
implements MemoryCache
    Base memory cache. Implements common functionality for memory cache. Provides object references ( not strong) storing.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0.0

      • get

        public android.graphics.Bitmap get(String key)
        从接口复制的说明: MemoryCache
        Returns value by key. If there is no value for key then null will be returned.
        指定者:
        get 在接口中 MemoryCache

      • put

        public boolean put(String key,
                   android.graphics.Bitmap value)
        从接口复制的说明: MemoryCache
        Puts value into cache by key
        指定者:
        put 在接口中 MemoryCache
        返回:
        true - if value was put into cache successfully, false - if value was not put into cache

      • remove

        public android.graphics.Bitmap remove(String key)
        从接口复制的说明: MemoryCache
        Removes item by key
        指定者:
